parameters.name: YesNo
parameters.description: True if features are to be created regardless of rebuild errors, false if not

title: ISldWorks.AllowFailedFeatureCreation
description: Sets whether to allow the creation of a feature that has rebuild errors.

parameters.name: YesNo
parameters.description: True if features are to be created regardless of rebuild errors, false if not

returns: The previous value, which is now replaced by the value for YesNo
remarks: By default, features are not created when invalid geometry is specified; however, after calling this method with YesNo set to True, the features are created but with rebuild errors.
